ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll be right back, have to do something. Lightmare said to Dark Mouse. Lightmare galloped outside of the base and headed into the forest. Lightmare

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
Date: Sat, 24 Jun 2000 19:31:54 -0400
MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

X-MSMail-Priority: Normal

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

"I'll be right back, have to do something." Lightmare said to Dark Mouse.
Lightmare galloped outside of the base and headed into the forest. Lightmare
transformed and fired 2 bolts. Both hit Arrow in the head and splattered him
everywhere. Stronghold looked up in time to be shot in the back by Lightmare
and forced down to his knees. Sinesis and Sinister pulled out their weapons,
to do the same to Stronghold as they did to Suukie. Scamrock leapt up and
hit Sinesis and Sinister both across the jaws with a spinning wheel kick!
Sinesis fell backwards into the tree. Sinister took a swing at Scamrock, but
Scamrock punches the weapon's handle, sending it flying intol a rock.
Scamrock executes a Hurracanrana onto the rock and the blade! Sineis' head
cut wide open, he stumbled a few steps and then went into stasis lock.
Arrow, being blown to pieces, mumbled about cards and how he always lost and
then went into stasis lock. Scamrock did a big turn kick, that almost took
Sinesis' head off! Lightmare snuck up behind Scamrock, her gun was jammed
for some odd reason and she had to do things the old fashioned way. Scamrock
grabbed her by the head, not even seeing her, and snapped her down to the
ground with a snapmare. Scamrock ran forward as Sinesis sat up and hit him
with a jumping calf kick. Sinesis was brutally punched and kicked by
Scamrock until he went into stasis lock. Lightmare coughed a few times.
Scamrock stomped on her until she went into stasis lock. Scamrock panted
fast and drug Stronghold and Arrow's pieces which he put into a bag, to The
People's Base, it was an emergency and he and his friends had to get
repaired. Well at least Stronghold was his friend, Arrow was the unpaid
butler, heh heh. Scamrcok went into the secret passgeway in the swamp and
threw his 2 comrades into the CR Chamber, then jumped in himself.

Sinesis suddenly came out of stasis lock and then went back in, out, in,
out, in, he started to drag Lightmare and Sinister back to the Pred base,
going in and out of stasis lock at weird times. He reached the base,
entered, and threw his comrades into the CR Chamber. He looked across the
room at any Preds that were there, then he went into stasis lock one more
time and fell backwards, right into the CR Chamber...
